creditline: Gift of Donna and Cargill MacMillan Jr.
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: black pouch with open pocket and front zippered pocket; black cord strap; three panels of brocade on front:  tan with orange, purple and gold flowers, circles and bands--green with gold flowers--light green with large flowers in pale gold; pairs of black beaded strands with bells at lower corners
dimension: 8 1/8 x 6 1/2 in. (20.64 x 16.51 cm) (without strap or beads)
medium: Cotton, silk, metallic threads, beads, metal bells, zipper
title: Pouch
